description: Did you know? You can get Justia Premium Placements to increase your visibility in both the Justia Lawyer Directory and the LII Directory. Members with premium placements also get access to profile traffic statistics.
Call (888) 587-8421 or submit this form to learn more.

config: While 2021 had many ups and downs, you are on track to keep your practice growing! Here are some tips that could help you to improve your Justia Profile, gain exposure, and get ahead of the curve in 2022:

• Keep your profile up-to-date.
  • Request peer reviews from your colleagues.
  • Ask your clients for reviews.
  • Participate regularly in Justia Ask A Lawyer.
  • Display your Justia Lawyer Rating Badge.
  • Consider Justia Premium Placements that can help you be found.

We are confident that improving your Justia Profile in the year to come will help you get that much closer to surpassing your goals! Thank you for being part of the Justia community and we look forward to being a helpful part of your firm’s journey as you achieve your goals in 2022.

description: Contact us today to get your Justia Premium Placement and start reaching more potential clients.
